title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7311.6 - Emergency and inpatient mental health services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7311.6 - Emergency and inpatient mental health services

State Regulations
(a) A facility shall have a designated plan
with a local mental health provider for youth access to emergency mental health
services. (b) A facility shall have
a designated plan to provide youth access to inpatient mental health services
at certified hospitals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7311.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
